name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Every night on TikTok, people are still quietly posting to mourn former Premier Li Keqiang.
In order to avoid being deleted, netizens can only cut out his face and not mention his name,
but these mourning posts will still be deleted at dawn the next day.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Supervisor Ma commented on the beating of Liangliang Lijun:
This is an announcement to everyone, especially young people, that the most hardworking, law-abiding and optimistic citizens do not deserve the Chinese Dream, and everyone else does not deserve it even more.
Thanks to Liangliang Lijun and his wife for helping us see the cruelty of China's reality.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Currently, Liangliang Lijun has been banned from all platforms.
Sunac wins✌️

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Ma Dugong's account was banned

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 22, the Yitai Jindu Mansion in Langfang, Hebei Province, had no sign of delivery, and a large number of owners came to the marketing center to hold banners to protect their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 22, the Times Tianyun property in Dongguan illegally bundled parking spaces without a pre-sale certificate. The owners came to the local petition center to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 22, the Guanxi Town Government in Hunan Province sent people to violently demolish farmers’ legally self-built houses. The helpless owners could only hold up their ID cards and post videos to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 23, Shanghai Baolong Group, due to wage arrears, the elderly people had no choice but to sleep in front of the company gate to demand their wages. As of the time of posting, these elderly people have been sleeping in the company for more than 20 days, and the wage arrears issue has not been resolved.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of November 22, in Huizhou, Guangdong, local urban management officers were fully armed and forcibly drove away the vendors who were setting up stalls on the roadside in Xinliao Village. Some people at the scene shouted: Down with the Japanese!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Wei Chaoguang, 55 years old, is a private entrepreneur who has suffered from polio since childhood.
He went from doing odd jobs to working in the woodworking and leather processing industries, and finally transformed into a leader in the real estate industry. He has accumulated a lot of wealth through these industries. While making money, he has also made a very great contribution to the local economy and donated to many projects.
On April 14, 2022, Wei Chaoguang was arrested by Hengshui Public Security Bureau for the crime of provoking trouble. After more than half a year of investigation, he was transferred to the procuratorate on the grounds of being involved in organized crime. During this period, dozens of suspects in the same case as Wei Chaoguang were placed under designated residential surveillance in a hotel in Hengshui. During the three-month designated residence period, almost all lawyers were not allowed to meet with him for more than 40 days. After being transferred to the detention center, many suspects reported to their lawyers that the Hengshui Public Security Special Case Team had tortured them by means of electric shock, beatings, long-term tiger benches, and deprivation of food and sleep. One of the co-defendants even broke the toilet lid and cut his artery to commit suicide because he could not bear the torture. These inhumane methods are horrifying just to imagine! For a disabled person who has been paralyzed since childhood and cannot walk, facing the violent beatings of tall and burly policemen, not only is he unable to resist, but almost every punch is fatal! 
On the morning of November 20, at the trial of the Wei Chaoguang case in Hebei, the defendant's attorney Ma Yaodong was deprived of the right to ask questions by the court's Dong Zhaojun (judge) because he asked him about torture and forced confession. The reason was that the defendant's lawyer asked about torture and forced confession, which was a restricted topic and was not allowed to be asked. Subsequently, many lawyers related to the case were driven out of the court by the judge of Zaoqiang County Court in Hebei Province.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/klmHPul7gC

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 22, under a video of the Argentine president getting out of a car and shaking hands with children, a netizen commented: I have never even met the director of a street.
But this is not just a problem of the leaders being high above, but also the result of the general public's long-term indifference and lack of concern for political life.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 23, in Yiyang, Hunan, a woman named Luo Canhong posted a video saying that her father Luo Shuzhong was a well-known local private entrepreneur who was forcibly taken away after being framed by others.
During the secret detention, he was subjected to cruel torture, including forced handcuffs and shackles for 24 hours, breaking his ribs, tying his father to a tiger bench for four consecutive days and nights, and forcing his father to eat feces and electrocute his genitals.
The woman knelt and kowtowed to implore everyone to pay attention to the 414 injustice case in Yiyang, Hunan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @SCong2002 Wow...I was wondering why there are so many robots under me every day, it turns out they are used for this at critical moments

November 22, Zhuhai, Guangdong, Hailong Construction Technology Co., Ltd.
The company used water guns to drive away workers demanding wages

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 22, it was reported online that Shijiazhuang Medical College organized dormitory inspections in the name of fire prevention inspections, resulting in the loss of students' electrical appliances and property, and some people resold the confiscated small cooking pots, hair dryers, curling irons, etc. on the Internet.
On the 23rd, Shijiazhuang Medical College responded to the Beijing News reporter that the school would regularly enter the dormitories to check for illegal electrical appliances for fire safety reasons, but the video was staged and the confiscated illegal electrical appliances would be returned during the holidays.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"I don't know"
On November 22, at the "Caijing" Annual Meeting 2024: Forecast and Strategy held in Beijing, the host asked Li Yang, a member of the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences and a financial expert, that the various problems of the current Chinese economy are also in our documents, and the problems have been seen, so why is it so difficult to implement and execute them?
Li Yang smiled and replied: I don't know.
Then he hurried off

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Owners of Sunac's unfinished buildings tell their stories of struggle

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 23, a stabbing incident occurred at the entrance of Jiuguang Restaurant on Yuyuan Road in Shanghai. Two chefs had an argument, and a 55-year-old chef stabbed a 22-year-old chef, leaving him with blood all over his head. Both were colleagues.
